title: Kimberly Wyatt gives birth to third child with husband Max Rogers
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Former pop star Kimberly Wyatt has given birth to her third child with husband Max Rogers.

The Pussycat Dolls member's partner, model Max, announced the happy news on Twitter yesterday.

He wrote: "Happy to announce that @KimberlyKWyatt gave birth this afternoon.

Mum & baby are doing very well. Looking forward to sharing all the details in a few weeks,for now we will switch off and welcome the new arrival to our family.

"My wife is incredible. @NHSEnglandLDN is a privelage."

The couple are already parents to Willow, four, and Maple, one.

(Image: Grant Buchanan / SplashNews.com)

(Image: maxrogersuk/Instagram)

Kimberly previously told fans she was going into hospital for a C-section on Friday, sharing a picture of her tummy and declaring: "Saying goodbye to my baby bump!... See you on the other side."

The couple confirmed their baby news in May, revealing the pregnancy had taken them both by surprise.

Kimberly told OK! magazine: "It was a surprise - but an amazing one.

"We weren't planning on having a third child this quickly. I can't deny I'd like to have a boy but ultimately we just want a happy and healthy baby."

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Rankin)

The singer, who married her partner in 2014, also admitted she was desperate to try a natural birth after needing surgical assistance with her previous two children.

"My wish has always been to have a natural birth, but I've not been that lucky," she told the mag.

"I've had two caesareans and I'm coming to terms with probably having another one."
description: Former Pussycat Dolls star Kimberly Wyatt has become a mum again for the third time
